name: Cartman's SMASH
description:
The animations in the game have been created using stop-motion. The plushies are real! There will be more characters in the future, if you want to fight for chicken with your own plush figure, don't hesitate to contact me (robin.daraban@gmail.com).

Have some troubles against the AI?

The AI has been develeoped using reinforcement learning. A neural network has been trained by having two agents playing against each other for several hours. It's far from perfect, but future versions are about to come!

Credits

Robin Daraban - Game Design

Andrea Bregoli - Music
